profile.career_objectives: To be able to work for a globally competitive, encouraging and stable company that will assist me in developing, improving, and obtaining the necessary skills in order to become the best software engineer possible.
profile.personal_statement: I am a highly competent software developer with over eight (8) years of experience developing a wide range of web and mobile solutions for a range of clients. I have proven expertise in building sophisticated, robust, secure, and scalable web and mobile applications. I have a thorough understanding of the software project lifecycle and I am very capable at all aspects of development from project planning to requirements gathering through to writing and testing code, creating documentation and providing technical support. I have excellent interpersonal and communication skills, which helps me thrive well when working with or leading teams.

education.school: Kwame Nkrumah University of Science & Technology
